refnamediv.refpurpose: Invokes the just-in-time compiler to produce a instantiable DSP process from a Faust program.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Faustcompile will compile a Faust program from a string, controlled by various arguments. Multi-line strings are accepted, using {{ }} to enclose the string.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Scode -- a string (in double-quotes or enclosed by {{ }}) containing a Faust program.
Sargs -- a string (in double-quotes or enclosed by {{ }}) containing Faust compiler args.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the faustcompile opcode, with a simple program that mixes two inputs:
ihandle faustcompile "process=+;", "-vec -lv 1"
